TABLE.NAME: tool_sessionmigrate_log
TABLE.COMMENT: Logs for session migration tool tasks

FIELD.NAME: action
FIELD.COMMENT: The action being performed, e.g., sync_closed_sessions

FIELD.NAME: targettype
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of the target identifier, e.g., productoid, sessionid

FIELD.NAME: targetidentifier
FIELD.COMMENT: The identifier of the target, e.g., the productoid or sessionid

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The status of the task (created, running, success, failed)

FIELD.NAME: details
FIELD.COMMENT: Additional details in JSON or text

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user who triggered the action
